types.name: Root
types.description: Root type is the entry point for the Twitter driver, providing actions to interact with the Twitter API.

actions.name: tweet

params.name: poll_options
params.description: A list of poll options for a Tweet with a poll, must be comma separated.

params.name: poll_duration_minutes
params.description: Duration of the poll in minutes for a Tweet with a poll.

actions.description: Action to post a new tweet with the specified text and optional poll options.

actions.name: endpoint
actions.description: Internal action to interact with the Twitter API endpoint.

actions.name: configure
actions.description: Action to configure the Twitter driver with client credentials.

fields.name: user
fields.description: Field representing a Twitter user, providing access to their tweets, followers, mentions, and liked tweets.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Internal field to interact with the Twitter API endpoint.

fields.name: tweets
fields.description: Field to manage a collection of tweets, allowing retrieval of individual tweets or pages of tweets.

fields.name: parse
fields.description: Field to parse and process tweet data.

fields.name: tests
fields.description: Field to test various functionalities of the Twitter driver.

events.name: statusChanged
events.description: Event triggered when the status of the Twitter driver changes.

types.name: TweetCollection

fields.name: one
fields.description: Retrieves a single tweet by its unique identifier.

fields.name: page

params.name: pagination_token
params.description: Returns results with a Tweet ID less than (that is, older than) the specified ID. The ID specified is exclusive and responses will not include it.

fields.description: Retrieves a page of tweets based on the specified query and optional pagination token.

types.description: TweetCollection manages a collection of tweets, allowing retrieval of individual tweets or pages of tweets.

types.name: TweetPage

fields.name: items
fields.description: A list of tweets included in the current page.

fields.name: next
fields.description: A reference to the next page of tweets, allowing for pagination.

types.description: TweetPage represents a paginated collection of tweets, providing navigation to the next page.

types.name: FollowersCollection

fields.name: page
fields.description: Retrieves a page of followers with optional pagination token, maximum results, and starting point.

types.description: FollowersCollection manages a collection of followers, allowing retrieval of pages of followers.

types.name: FollowersPage

fields.name: items
fields.description: A list of user profiles representing the followers included in the current page.

fields.name: next
fields.description: A reference to the next page of followers, allowing for pagination.

types.description: FollowersPage represents a paginated collection of followers, providing navigation to the next page.

types.name: MentionsCollection

fields.name: page
fields.description: Retrieves a page of mentions with optional pagination token, maximum results, and starting point.

types.description: MentionsCollection manages a collection of mentions, allowing retrieval of pages of mentions.

types.name: MentionsPage

fields.name: items
fields.description: A list of tweets included in the current page that mention the user.

fields.name: next
fields.description: A reference to the next page of mentions, allowing for pagination.

types.description: MentionsPage represents a paginated collection of mentions, providing navigation to the next page.

types.name: LikedCollection

fields.name: page
fields.description: Retrieves a page of liked tweets with optional pagination token and maximum results.

types.description: LikedCollection manages a collection of liked tweets, allowing retrieval of pages of liked tweets.

types.name: LikedPage
types.description: LikedPage represents a paginated collection of liked tweets, providing navigation to the next page.

types.name: LikingCollection
types.description: LikingCollection manages a collection of users who liked a tweet, allowing retrieval of pages of such users.

types.name: LikingPage
types.description: LikingPage represents a paginated collection of users who liked a tweet, providing navigation to the next page.

types.name: User
types.description: User type represents a Twitter user, providing access to their tweets, followers, mentions, and liked tweets.

types.name: Tweet

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the tweet.

fields.name: likingUsers
fields.description: Collection of users who have liked the tweet.

types.description: Tweet type represents an individual tweet, providing access to its content and users who liked it.

types.name: MaxRedirectsError
types.description: MaxRedirectsError type represents an error that occurs when the maximum number of redirects is exceeded during an API call.

types.name: Tests
types.description: Tests type provides actions to test various functionalities of the Twitter driver.
